item.title: CSE 1325 - Object Oriented Programming
item.description:
This is the course page for CSE 1325 - Object-Oriented Programming in Summer 2023. Here youâ€™ll find slides and other helpful resources. All assignments and announcements will be posted on Canvas.

Teaching Assistants

  • Xuan Wang (xuan (dot) wang2 (at) mavs (dot) uta (dot) edu)

TAs across all sections are eligible to help you with assignments and other coding questions. Click here to view the TA lab schedule.

Office Hours

Office hours are facilitated via Teams. If these times do not work for you, e-mail me to schedule an appointment.

  • Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from 2PM - 3PM
  • Tuesday and Thursday from 4:30PM - 5:30PM

item.title: CSE 6363 - Machine Learning (Summer 2023)
item.description:
This is the course page for CSE 6363 - Machine Learning in Summer 2023. Here you’ll find class notes and other helpful resources. All assignments and announcements will be posted on Canvas.

Teaching Assistants
